Articles.Content:
Hello, all space geeks!

I've started a blog on rocket science, astronomy, and spaceflight! It will have space news, space science, and maybe a little bit of KSP. Please have a look at: http://www.deltav.xyz/

So far I have two posts, I hope to add many more!

Enjoy!

Hmm. I expect regular updates on goings-on within the KSP community. Also, rageposting.

We like rageposting. And memes. And pretty much everything that's forbidden here. In moderation, of course. I'd hate to have to moderate this post.

Hmm. I expect regular updates on goings-on within the KSP community. Also, rageposting.

We like rageposting. And memes. And pretty much everything that's forbidden here. In moderation, of course. I'd hate to have to moderate this post.

How do you mean? Are you talking about the blog, the OP, or this thread? Sorry to be dense, but I don't understand. If you want, I can remove something from the OP, or get the thread closed. If you mean the blog, I don't think I'll be putting too much political stuff on it, more news.

I was being facetious. These are all outrageous suggestions I was trying to make.

Oops.

I was being facetious. These are all outrageous suggestions I was trying to make.

Oops.

Ah, don't worry, I'm new to blogging, and this post is a bit of self-promotion. Don't worry, I'll make sure to spread the truth about the moon landings were faked. On Pluto.

Don't worry, I'll make sure to spread the truth about the moon landings were faked. On Pluto.

I thought the release schedule said we weren't supposed to talk about those until they're released in 2018? The Illuminati might want a few words with you.

I thought the release schedule said we weren't supposed to talk about those until they're released in 2018? The Illuminati might want a few words with you.

Oh, I thought it was 8102.
I have a new post! (Yes, this is kind of a bump)

How do you mean? Are you talking about the blog, the OP, or this thread? Sorry to be dense, but I don't understand. If you want, I can remove something from the OP, or get the thread closed. If you mean the blog, I don't think I'll be putting too much political stuff on it, more news.

I think you should put a ragepost up just for DuoDex.

Besides, once he sees your 'bump' .....

lol
I have another 2 posts. I'll stop bumping after this, but I think they're my best yet.

Thanks for the link. Looks good.

Bob C.
Could you do a multi part series on space colonization?

Thanks for the link. Looks good.

Bob C.

You're welcome!

Could you do a multi part series on space colonization?

No promises, but that sounds interesting. I could start with early human colonization of earth, and then talk about colonization on the most easily colonized worlds...
In your post about rocket engines, technically the most common type by number is the solid fueled hobby motors.

On 10/3/2015, 8:48:15, Bill Phil said:

In your post about rocket engines, technically the most common type by number is the solid fueled hobby motors.

True, but I think I'll leave it as it is, since it's a bit confusing to suddenly start talking about model rockets halfway through.

I like it.

Thanks!
